name: Bird Pong
description:
Play pong in the sky with a bird as the ball!

Controls: Left cloud: W and S

                      Right cloud: up and down arrows

                      R to reset

Made with ClickTeam Fusion: https://www.clickteam.com/

Bird collides with cloud sfx: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/game/

background music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
